name: v-calendar
description: A clean and extendable plugin for building simple attributed calendars in Vue.js.
author: Nathan Reyes <nathanreyes@me.com>

scripts.build: yarn build:lib && yarn build:calendar && yarn build:date-picker && yarn build:popover && yarn build:popover-ref && yarn build:popover-row
scripts.build:calendar: vue-cli-service build --target lib --dest lib/components --name calendar src/components/Calendar.vue
scripts.build:date-picker: vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --dest lib/components --name date-picker src/components/DatePicker.vue
scripts.build:popover: vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --dest lib/components --name popover src/components/Popover.vue
scripts.build:popover-ref: vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --dest lib/components --name popover-ref src/components/PopoverRef.vue
scripts.build:popover-row: vue-cli-service build --no-clean --target lib --dest lib/components --name popover-row src/components/PopoverRow.vue
